resume.tagline: I'm a software engineer, product designer, and entrepreneur. I have delivered world-class user experiences. MERN stack specialty.
resume.description: Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of Web frameworks.

experiences.bullets: ‚óè Leading the development of a MERN stack-based SaaS platform to optimize eCommerce operations, currently achieving a 20% increase in client operational efficiency. ‚óè Orchestrated Agile/Scrum practices, enhancing collaboration between the core team and outsourced developers, along with marketing teams for product alignment. ‚óè Initiated comprehensive market and technical research, integrating eCommerce trends into the platform's design, ensuring market relevance and competitive edge.

experiences.position: Founding Frontend Engineer at Have You Met, Inc.
experiences.bullets: ‚óè Directed a lean frontend development team to launch MVPs for a social networking app, using React Native and Node.js, leading to a 30% surge in user engagement. ‚óè Constructed a robust internal data platform (social API) using AWS, enhancing user matching efficiency and expanding user base and market reach by 25%. ‚óè Implemented CI/CD practices (Github Actions) for rapid iteration and deployment, facilitating a culture of rapid learning and adaptation to user feedback. ‚óè Hosted weekly talks for knowledge exchange within the team.

experiences.position: Full Stack Application Developer at Intel
experiences.bullets: ‚óè Developed and executed a comprehensive marketing strategy, increasing client acquisition by 40% and retention by 25%. ‚óè Designed and implemented a data-driven marketing dashboard, enabling the team to make data-informed decisions, leading to a 30% increase in marketing ROI. ‚óè Led the development of a marketing automation platform, reducing the time spent on repetitive tasks by 50% and increasing the team's productivity by 30%.
